history.proof: induction lt. - simpl. auto. - simpl. destruct a. rewrite IHlt. sfirstorder depth: 3.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
l: pos n
h: pos n
c: pos n
Hch: c <> h
Hcl: c <> l
Hhl: h <> l
q: nat
p: nat
decoder_error: list (bsm_instr n)
lt: list (list bool * list bool)

Goal:
length_decoder lt = 2 + 3 * length lt + size_cards lt

Premises:
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
Notation pos := Fin.t
size_cards = fun lt => fold_right (fun (c : list bool * list bool) (x : nat) => length (fst c) + length (snd c) + x) 0 lt : list (list bool * list bool) -> nat Arguments size_cards _%list_scope
length_decoder = fix length_decoder lt : nat := match lt with | nil => 2 | (th, tl) :: lt0 => 3 + length th + length tl + length_decoder lt0 end : list (list bool * list bool) -> nat Arguments length_decoder _%list_scope
length : forall A : Type, list A -> nat
Inductive bsm_instr (n : nat) : Set := bsm_pop : pos n -> nat -> nat -> bsm_instr n | bsm_push : pos n -> bool -> bsm_instr n Arguments bsm_instr _%nat_scope Arguments bsm_pop [n]%nat_scope _ (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments bsm_push [n]%nat_scope _ _%bool_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
decoder = fix decoder (s i : nat) lt {struct lt} : list (bsm_instr n) := match lt with | nil => decoder_error | (th, tl) :: lt0 => POP c (3 + length (tile h l th tl) + i) q :: tile h l th tl ++ PUSH c Zero :: POP c s s :: decoder s (3 + length (tile h l th tl) + i) lt0 end : nat -> nat -> list (list bool * list bool) -> list (bsm_instr n) Arguments decoder (_ _)%nat_scope _%list_scope
Nat.div_add : forall a b c : nat, c <> 0 -> (a + b * c) / c = a / c + b
tile_concat = fix tile_concat (ln : list nat) lt {struct ln} : list bool * list bool := match ln with | nil => (nil, nil) | x :: ln0 => let (th, tl) := nth x lt (nil, nil) in let (hh, ll) := tile_concat ln0 lt in (hh ++ th, ll ++ tl) end : list nat -> list (list bool * list bool) -> list bool * list bool Arguments tile_concat (_ _)%list_scope
decoder_length : forall (s i : nat) lt, length (decoder s i lt) = length_decoder lt
Nat.pow_le_mono_r : forall a b c : nat, a <> 0 -> b <= c -> a ^ b <= a ^ c
Nat.add_carry_bits : forall (a b : nat) (c0 : bool), exists c : nat, a + b + Nat.b2n c0 = Nat.lxor (Nat.lxor a b) c /\ c / 2 = Nat.lor (Nat.land a b) (Nat.land c (Nat.lor a b)) /\ Nat.testbit c 0 = c0
tiles_solvable = fun lt0 => exists ln : list nat, ln <> nil /\ Forall (fun x : nat => x < length lt0) ln /\ (let (hh, ll) := tile_concat ln lt0 in hh = ll) : list (list bool * list bool) -> Prop Arguments tiles_solvable _%list_scope
copy_stack_spec : forall x y z : pos n, x <> y -> x <> z -> y <> z -> forall (i : nat) (l : list bool) (v w : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = l -> v#>z = nil -> w = v[(l ++ v#>y)/y] -> (i, copy_stack x y z i) // (i, v) -> > (16 + i, w)
Nat.add3_bit0 : forall a b c : nat, Nat.testbit (a + b + c) 0 = xorb (xorb (Nat.testbit a 0) (Nat.testbit b 0)) (Nat.testbit c 0)
list_bool_dec : forall l m : list bool, {l = m} + {l <> m}
copy_rev_stack_spec : forall x y z : pos n, x <> y -> x <> z -> y <> z -> forall (i : nat) (l : list bool) (v w : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = l -> w = v[nil/x][(rev l ++ v#>y)/y][(rev l ++ v#>z)/z] -> (i, copy_rev_stack x y z i) // (i, v) -> > (9 + i, w)
list_bool_nat = fix list_bool_nat (l : list bool) : nat := match l with | nil => 1 | One :: l0 => 1 + 2 * list_bool_nat l0 | Zero :: l0 => 0 + 2 * list_bool_nat l0 end : list bool -> nat Arguments list_bool_nat _%list_scope
bsm_steps_POP_any_inv : forall (n a : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (b : bool) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = b :: ll -> p = 1 + i -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[a] -> st -> {b0 : nat | b0 < a /\ P // (1 + i, v[ll/x]) -[b0] -> st}
bsm_steps_POP_1_inv : forall (n a : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = One :: ll -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[a] -> st -> {b : nat | b < a /\ P // (1 + i, v[ll/x]) -[b] -> st}
cs_spec_rec : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (i p q : nat) (l m : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = l -> v#>y = m -> exists w : vec (list bool) n, (forall z : pos n, z <> x -> z <> y -> v#>z = w#>z) /\ (l = m -> (i, compare_stacks x y i p q) // (i, v) ->> (p, w)) /\ (l <> m -> (i, compare_stacks x y i p q) // (i, v) ->> (q, w))
compare_stack_neq_spec : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (i p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>x <> v#>y -> exists w : vec (list bool) n, (i, compare_stacks x y i p q) // (i, v) -> > (q, w) /\ (forall z : pos n, z <> x -> z <> y -> v#>z = w#>z)
compare_stack_spec : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (i p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n), exists (j : nat) (w : vec (list bool) n), (i, compare_stacks x y i p q) // (i, v) -> > (j, w) /\ (forall z : pos n, z <> x -> z <> y -> v#>z = w#>z /\ (v#>x = v#>y /\ j = p \/ v#>x <> v#>y /\ j = q))
bsm_steps_PUSH_inv : forall (n k : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (b : bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, PUSH x b :: nil) <sc P -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[k] -> st -> {a : nat | a < k /\ P // (1 + i, v[(b :: v#>x)/x]) -[a] -> st}
tile_spec : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (high low : list bool) (i : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), st = (length (tile x y high low) + i, v[(high ++ v#>x)/x][(low ++ v#>y)/y]) -> (i, tile x y high low) // (i, v) -> > st
pos_eq_dec : forall (n : nat) (x y : pos n), {x = y} + {x <> y}
compare_stack_eq_spec : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (i p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = v#>y -> exists w : vec (list bool) n, (i, compare_stacks x y i p q) // (i, v) -> > (p, w) /\ (forall z : pos n, z <> x -> z <> y -> v#>z = w#>z)
bsm_steps_POP_0_inv : forall (n a : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = Zero :: ll -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[a] -> st -> {b : nat | b < a /\ P // (p, v[ll/x]) -[b] -> st}
lt = fun n m : nat => S n <= m : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments lt (_ _)%nat_scope
bsm_steps_POP_E_inv : forall (n a : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = nil -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[a] -> st -> {b : nat | b < a /\ P // (q, v) -[b] -> st}
move_rev_stack_spec : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (i : nat) (l : list bool) (v w : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = l -> w = v[nil/x][(rev l ++ v#>y)/y] -> (i, move_rev_stack x y i) // (i, v) -> > (7 + i, w)
increment_spec : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (i : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (l m : list bool), list_bool_succ l m -> v#>x = l -> (i, increment x y i) // (i, v) -> > (15 + i, v[m/x])
Nat.lt_wd = PeanoNat.Nat.lt_wd_obligation_1 : Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq (Morphisms.respectful eq iff)) lt
bsm_compute_POP_any : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (b : bool) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = b :: ll -> p = 1 + i -> P // (1 + i, v[ll/x]) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st
tile_length : forall (x y : pos n) (high low : list bool), length (tile x y high low) = length high + length low
prod_length : forall (A B : Type) (l : list A) (l' : list B), length (list_prod l l') = length l * length l'

```coq
intros.
induction lt.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. destruct a. rewrite IHlt. auto.
Qed.
```
